item.title: About me
item.description:
I’m a third year undergraduate student from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications(BUPT). My research interest includes machine learning ,signal processing and sampling.

I am very fortunate to be a visiting student of Prof. Junjie Ma of Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science(AMSS).

You can find my CV here: Haitong Lan’s Curriculum Vitae.

My contact information

  • QQ : 1517609268
  • Wechat & Phone: 15505405918
  • e-mail:lanhaitong@bupt.edu.cn
